Module Exe5_316394071_206933855
Package Model

Class Functions

java.lang.Object
Model.Functions
public class Functions extends Object
In this class we are going to use methods to make reuse of the code. basically its a class that contains a static methods that gets reused many time.
Author:
Tamir Uzan and Moshiko Bitton

    • checkStr

      public static boolean checkStr(String toCheck)
      In this method we are going to check whether a string only char a-z and A-Z.
      Parameters:
      toCheck - represents the string we want to check.
      Returns:
      returns true if contains only char letter, false otherwise.

    • checkModel

      public static boolean checkModel(String toCheck)
      In this method we are going to check whether a model contains a valid string A valid string means that chars letters and numbers can be used only.
      Parameters:
      toCheck - represents the string to check.
      Returns:
      returns true if valid, false otherwise.

      Returns:
